website_summaries.verdict: A premium ergonomic footrest that is constructed from high-end materials and is manually adjustable to 3 positions.
pros: Adjustable to multiple tilt angles and height settings for unmatched convenience
Helps reduce pressure on the back and spine
Comes with non-rubber slip feet to ensure the footrest stays in place at all times
cons: Tends to be less stable and sturdy than comparable ergonomic footrests

customer_reviews.title: Why the rubber pieces?
customer_reviews.text: Enjoyed this product thoroughly for about 2 weeks until the first rubber piece "split". Overall this was still a great product for 3-6 months. As the rubber pieces started failing, the product became increasingly unstable. The alignment would slip and you would have to reassemble the unit, but it was still effective when put back together. In less than a year though, all but one of the rubber pieces have split and 2 of the plastic pieces threaded through them have broken off rendering the product useless.
customer_reviews.author: Michael O.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: As a short person: Thank you! My feet can finally pretend that they're hitting the ground!
customer_reviews.author: Aryss

customer_reviews.title: Amazing product to own for workstation
customer_reviews.text: This is the best invention to have ever been created. I am a short person, and all of the chairs are too tall for me. This foot rest makes it comfortable to sit all day at my desk without developing knee and back pain. My posture has improved, and I can imagine life without my foot rest. I also like how you can tilt back and forth with your legs, it keeps me preoccupied. I don’t like the foot rests that are completely stiff and without the ability to rock your feet. I highly recommend buying this product.
customer_reviews.author: mnm

customer_reviews.title: Utilitarian but klunky-looking
customer_reviews.text: It's adjustable, which is great. Doesn't weigh much and doesn't slide around on my wood floor. It's bigger than it needs to be and the raised bumps that are supposed to massage your feet?are also bigger than they need to be - not exactly uncomfortable but distracting. It's not very attractive but it does what it's supposed to do.
customer_reviews.author: Joanna B.

customer_reviews.title: Lasted 5 months
customer_reviews.text: After 5 months of VERY LIGHT usage, this broke underneath where the bar catches on the rungs which set the height. A bit sad because it was a good one but maybe this is a gift because although it was good, it was not great. Will find another model next time. Maybe it was just a defective unit. Maybe it was poor design. Maybe it was maybeline.
customer_reviews.author: MichaelS

customer_reviews.title: Not fix
customer_reviews.text: Didn't realize that the tilt is not fix. Giving me a wobbly feel when using. Might be great for some but not what I was looking for.
customer_reviews.author: Felix

customer_reviews.title: Pleased with my purchase
customer_reviews.text: Sometimes you don't know what you are going to get. I've been using this for over 6 moths and the quality of this has held up nicely. I appreciate the durability and the fact that it's adjustable. Makes sitting at work much more pleasant.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa A. Markarian

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: Just what I was looking for. Well made, heavy enough to stay in place, allows the feet and ankles to move for comfort, and is quiet as you flex your feet and ankles.
customer_reviews.author: Der Angler

customer_reviews.title: Happy Back
customer_reviews.text: I had been looking for relief from ongoing lower back pain, and realized that I wasn't sitting exactly ergonomically at my home desk. A foot rest was what I needed, and this one fits the bill perfectly. It's light-weight and easy to adjust. My back says "Thank you!"
customer_reviews.author: Andrea Lee Carter

customer_reviews.title: Comfy and easy to adjust
customer_reviews.text: Works great. It's the perfect thing to keep me comfortable when I'm spending hours at my crafting desk, where my feet don't reach the floor. I like that I can adjust the height without having to get up and fool with it. I have one of these at my work as well. I love it.
customer_reviews.author: Debbie Devine

customer_reviews.title: auto adjust feature is just a poor excuse for being floppy
customer_reviews.text: feels incredibly chintzy. auto adjust feature is just a poor excuse for being floppy. height adjustment is secure until you have to move it, it doesn't actually lock. If you place your foot in the edge it'll rock the thing side to side.
customer_reviews.author: Tom Lin

customer_reviews.title: Not impressed
customer_reviews.text: Use it for 4 months, then it broke. On the lowest setting possible. Poorly made.
customer_reviews.author: Customer for almost 2 decades

customer_reviews.title: Was fine while it lasted
customer_reviews.text: Was fine while it lasted, but after 4 months it broke. The height adjustment slots cracked off and most of the rubber gaskets that allow it to pivot/adjust are shredded/split in half. If it was $10-15 I would say it was worth it, but at a premium price I'd have expected better.
customer_reviews.author: Brutang

customer_reviews.title: sturdy & solid plastic
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what I was looking for, sturdy & solid plastic. Better than what I could find locally & my therapist approved it instantly, because it was the same model she had in her office & could not find the manufacturer's name on it.
customer_reviews.author: MountainMan

customer_reviews.title: Not that good
customer_reviews.text: I find the footrest to be sort of unstable. It does not stay in one position, doesn't lock and can't keep it flat at all. I have it on a hard wood floor and it slides around.
customer_reviews.author: Ladybug11

customer_reviews.title: Not good quality...
customer_reviews.text: I thought all footrests would be at least similar quality because it has such a simple function. This footrest uses some plastic rings at the pivot points and these have fallen apart.
customer_reviews.author: Peace

customer_reviews.title: and I like the adjustable height and pivot
customer_reviews.text: Works very well, and I like the adjustable height and pivot. I also like the little circles that can serve as massagers if you take your shoes off.
customer_reviews.author: kkg003

customer_reviews.title: Not my favorite.  Look for something else.
customer_reviews.text: Doesn't lock in place. The angle isn't right for my posture. I would recommend a desk hammock over this.
customer_reviews.author: Sir Verde All Day

customer_reviews.title: Decent
customer_reviews.text: I like how there’s different levels that you can raise it too. The downside is that if you have to lower it, you’ll have to go down and lower it. It takes a little bit of used to to know how to lower it. It’s plastic so obviously it will make noises when you’re moving your feet around. It does make noises when you are raising it or lowering it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: ok
customer_reviews.text: This product worked well, but I ended up giving it away as I could not get just the right height for my feet.
customer_reviews.author: Ludwika Goodson

customer_reviews.title: It is comfrontable and helps health issues.
customer_reviews.text: I am short and when I sit on chairs on my porch or in my kitchen chairs my feet don't sit flat on the floor so I cuts off some circulation and my feet swell. This is great to raise my feet and legs for comfort and health. I think it will work great for my purposes. Thank you.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Always my go-to
customer_reviews.text: I always get this model for its full adjustability, rocking feature, and durability. Can't go wrong.
customer_reviews.author: cheryllyne

customer_reviews.title: The mechanism that keeps the footrest at an angle is flimsy.
customer_reviews.text: I used it on a daily basis for about 2 months before the plastic piece holding the foot rest at an angle broke. I used it under a desk, barefoot, for about 8-10 hours per day. I've never put additional weight on it other than the weight of my legs when sitting down. At the end of the day, even with normal wear and tear taken into account, the product should last more than 2 months.
customer_reviews.author: mutantturkey

customer_reviews.title: Good quality
customer_reviews.text: This model works great. Ordered as a replacement for one that I bought years ago.
customer_reviews.author: Justmetwo

customer_reviews.title: Thumbs way up
customer_reviews.text: Yes! It works and stays in place fairly well. ---After having this for a few months I still love it.----
customer_reviews.author: JaneTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Ok product, but not solid
customer_reviews.text: the stand keep moving and you cant maintain it at the height you need
customer_reviews.author: tttttttttttttttttttttttt

customer_reviews.title: I love the fact I can change the height and the ...
customer_reviews.text: Just what I needed for my office desk! I love the fact I can change the height and the rotation. Very happy with it!!
customer_reviews.author: Rachelle L. Yost

customer_reviews.title: Bought for work and is perfect hight for me to keep my legs up
customer_reviews.text: Bought for work and is perfect hight for me to keep my legs up. I have it at the highest height. I'm 5' 4". Bit tricky to get it picked in initially but once it is it's perfect
customer_reviews.author: Michele

customer_reviews.title: Foot Rest
customer_reviews.text: I love my foot rest. It give me back and leg support when sitting for a while. I love how you can massage your foot on it when needed. Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: Theresa Dobbins

customer_reviews.title: Big help!
customer_reviews.text: This has been awesome! I am having low back and hip problems such that I cannot sit anywhere - chair, sofa, nothing - without extreme pain. With this under my feet, I can sit comfortably in multiple chairs.
customer_reviews.author: Mary

customer_reviews.title: Happy I bought this one!
customer_reviews.text: Exactly as stated in description! Loved that I just pulled it out of the box and started using it. No assembly needed. It adjusts easily and is great in my home office. Light enough to be portable if you needed to take it with you.

customer_reviews.title: Good to Test out first
customer_reviews.text: Purchased and returned this item immediately because it was not sturdy and stable.

customer_reviews.title: The Halter F6031 is working great for me
customer_reviews.text: I had open heart surgery 8 weeks ago and I went back to work 6 weeks after surgery, my ankles and feet have been swelling and I needed something to lift my feet up under my desk. The Halter F6031 is working great for me. I would recommend this idea.

customer_reviews.title: It's not that great
customer_reviews.text: I use this product for work but it dosen't really offer that much comfort. Every time I move my feet it makes allot noise. It's cheap, and sounds cheap.

customer_reviews.title: Ialso like that it swivels up and down

It really takes the pressure off my back when sitting for long periods of time. Ialso like that it swivels up and down, that's not a flaw; it's a feature!

customer_reviews.title: Very good product. I had leg surgery and needed to ...
customer_reviews.text: Very good product. I had leg surgery and needed to prop my leg up while sitting at my desk. Very comfortable

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for under my desk to give my back a rest and it works just fine

customer_reviews.title: the product is exactly as described, very cosy and good for health
customer_reviews.text: It is a very useful item for people like me who spend 10-12 hours in front of the the computer. I am an authorised translator and I work from home, and I am 58, so it was high time I started taking care of my health

customer_reviews.title: it keeps my feet at a perfect angle while typing at the computer
customer_reviews.text: It allows my ankles and my calves to stay in constant motions. Also, it keeps my feet at a perfect angle while typing at the computer.

customer_reviews.title: Good for the price
customer_reviews.text: It help for the sitting. Very comfortable but not build very strong. I am using on my office and it already start making strange sounds after 5-6 months of light use

customer_reviews.title: Don't buy it
customer_reviews.text: It broke after a month of use. The height can no longer be adjusted.

customer_reviews.text: Great foot rest. Works very well for people with back problems. Able to adjust the height and it tilts.

customer_reviews.title: Way too light and slid around easily on a wood floor
customer_reviews.text: Cheap & flimsy. Way too light and slid around easily on a wood floor. Disappointing :(

customer_reviews.title: Great product.
customer_reviews.text: Very nice product. I got one for my home office and office at work. Very good price.

customer_reviews.title: The top is comfortable and effective enough
customer_reviews.text: It works until it suddenly doesn't. The top is comfortable and effective enough, but the adjustable slots for the metal rod on the underside of the foot rest are made of pretty bad plastic that snapped within a month and a half. My return window is closed and I'm out $35 for a useless hunk of plastic.

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for work and have enjoyed it. I will buy one for home.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Awesome product! Would buy again! Did buy 3 more today!

customer_reviews.title: This item has good dimensions and seems durable enough for what I need ...
customer_reviews.text: This item has good dimensions and seems durable enough for what I need it for (use at work desk). Wish the metal rod in it were a little longer as the item would be less prone to slightly dipping to the left or right when my feet were on it. I'm 235lbs, so this probably won't happen to lighter people. And it's not that big of a deal.

customer_reviews.title: Love it

customer_reviews.title: This foot rest is great. You can adjust the height and it also ...
customer_reviews.text: This foot rest is great. You can adjust the height and it also swivels so you do not feel like you are resting on a hard solid brick.

customer_reviews.title: ... an employee in my department and she seems to like it. Used it same day when received
customer_reviews.text: This product was purchased for an employee in my department and she seems to like it. Used it same day when received, and she explained that it works great. Did not have any problems setting up, and is nice to have multiple height settings.

customer_reviews.title: Satisfied with this
customer_reviews.text: Very happy with this product so far. Seems very sturdy.

customer_reviews.text: I quickly returned this foot rest! It is not well constructed and definitely not sturdy enough. I would not recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Miki

customer_reviews.title: The Best!
customer_reviews.text: This is the best foot rest. The 2-height adjustment is what sold me and having the higher height really helps fit me at 5'3-1/2". The moveable foot rest keeps my feet in a comfortable position while seated. I highly recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Carla

customer_reviews.title: Very Good Product to rest your back and hips while working ...
customer_reviews.text: Very Good Product to rest your back and hips while working on the computer or watching a movie. Adjustability is helpful and easy. Sturdy and well made. Just a good product for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Robert F. Cooper

customer_reviews.title: Product arrived slightly damaged; a part of it was ...
customer_reviews.text: Product arrived slightly damaged; a part of it was chipped off but it doesn't affect the functionality of the product. It serves my need for a footrest at the computer, though it seems a bit wobbly when I have just one foot rested on the sides, so I'm concerned it might break in the future.
customer_reviews.author: Jake Edwards

customer_reviews.title: Just what I needed.
customer_reviews.text: Works great. I like that it rocks so I can stretch my ankles.
customer_reviews.author: Deatres R. Bagby

customer_reviews.title: Love it, bought 2 of them for myself and ...
customer_reviews.text: Love it, bought 2 of them for myself and for my husband. It makes sitting much more comfortable and helps with back pain.
customer_reviews.author: Pat MC

customer_reviews.title: You can adjust the height easily. The angle can be controlled by shifting your ...
customer_reviews.text: This footrest is exactly as described. You can adjust the height easily. The angle can be controlled by shifting your feet - no need to reach down and adjust it. I find myself rocking my feet and being able to shift my position with ease. The material allows for my feet to move around easily, but they don't slide around. I know that a lot of that is due to the knobs on the top of the foot rest. The downside of the knobs is that I don't think I could use this product barefoot, but perhaps that wouldn't annoy others like it would me.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very happy with the purchase
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what I expected and as pictured. Very happy with the purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Kalina Kowalska

customer_reviews.title: This foot rest makes a lot of noises when I ...
customer_reviews.text: This foot rest makes a lot of noises when I move my feet. Also, it often moves with pressure of my feet, and it is not stable. It does not stick to floor.
customer_reviews.author: M.M

customer_reviews.title: Does not lock-cheap plastic-however I like the wiggling
customer_reviews.text: That's what you get for the price-cheap plastic-but I like it -at least for the time-it is poorly designed that it does not lock and I understand why some do not like that. I personally really enjoy the wiggling motion and I think its actually very comfortable but it should be an option and it should be clearly spelled out that it does not lock.Sometimes I wonder if Amazone should not have a review of what's being claimed -ultimately their name is on-anyhow- cheap stuff which might do the trick if your height is just right and it does not lock.
customer_reviews.author: analyst1946

customer_reviews.title: Love this product
customer_reviews.text: I have really enjoyed this product. I was amazed how well my back has responded.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Slipery
customer_reviews.text: I'm using it on a hard floor mat and there is almost no grip to the floor causing it to slide away under the slightest pressure. I suppose I can add some non-slip skids or something. Aside from that, it's rather tall and thick for what I needed, even on its lowest setting. The surface pattern is a bit harsh on bare feet. Not a bad product in the short time I've had it, but I will have to increase my chair height, my (non adjustable) desk height (to account for my higher chair that barely fits on its lowest setting), and grip on the footrest.
customer_reviews.author: gourdsFan

customer_reviews.title: Avoid
customer_reviews.text: It broke within a month and funny how my window to replace or returned is closed. The device that holds the rod up for various levels just smapped off.

customer_reviews.title: Better than a stationary foot stool
customer_reviews.text: Bigger than I expected...which is a good thing. The foot rest is a hard plastic...I would have preferred a softer surface. Height adjustment is easy and tilting action doesn't stay in position, so I find myself tilting it back and forth quite a bit. Overall, pretty happy with it.
customer_reviews.author: Smurf

customer_reviews.title: Feels amazing. I've needed this for the past 10yrs and ...
customer_reviews.text: My short legs no longer dangle! Feels amazing. I've needed this for the past 10yrs and didn't know it. Thank you!

customer_reviews.text: This works pretty well and is adjustable. It allows you to exercise feet and ankles while working. It's not cushy, but then again it doesn't look like it's going to wear out, so far has been very sturdy, and is easy to clean. I just wish it cured all my aches and pains, but alas, that hasn't happened. Still, I'm glad I bought it.

customer_reviews.title: Great product

I dropped a star because I haven't tested out all of the height variations/ keeping it locked at something other than flat (and it's a little annoying trying to adjust it), but it functions exactly as expected and is the right height when flat to keep my feet from dangling.

product_meta.title: Under Desk Foot Rest, Black Footstool & Office Ergonomic Footrest, Adjustable Angle & 3 Different Height Positions, 18.1" X 13.3" - Great for Home & Work
product_meta.description:
Color:Black - 1 PackHad a rough day?
Want to just sit down and relax with your feet elevated? 

Look no further than the Halter Adjustable Footrest. Whether you're at work, at home on the couch, or anywhere in between, you can enjoy some nice relaxation! Enjoy extending your legs and getting off your feet. Being completely adjustable to multiple tilt angles and multiple height settings, it allows you to find what is just right for you to relax comfortably. 

Features:
Ergonomic design to support your legs
Helps to improves posture and circulation by keeping feet and legs elevated
Easily adjusts to multiple tilt angles ( 0° ~ 30° )
Manually adjustable to 3 different heights ( 4.3" / 5.5" / 6.7" )
Non-Slip Rubber Feet enhance overall stability
Lifetime Warranty: We stand by our products! 

Specifications:
Material: High Impact Polystyrene
Dimensions: 13.3" X 18.1"
Height Positions: 4.3" / 5.5" / 6.7"
Tilt Angles: 0° ~ 30°
feature_bullets: ✅ PREMIUM FOOT REST: Rest your legs in your office while working, or at home after a long day, Height is manually adjustable to 3 positions ( 4.3" / 5.5" / 6.7" )

✅ NON-SKID SURFACE: Large Platform Surface (18.1" X 13.3") texture provides a non-skid surface for your feet to rest on. Perfect for office & home use.
✅ TOP QUALITY: This ergonomic foot rest is made of high impact polystyrene for a sturdy & stable feel.
